notes: Does not reset the cooldown of the following items: Refresher Orb and Refresher Shard. Does not share cooldowns with the aforementioned items as well.
Does not share cooldowns with the aforementioned items as well.

Only refreshes items in the owner's inventory and backpack. Items in the stash, in other units' inventories, or dropped items are unaffected. Only refreshes items owned by the owner. Allied items in the inventory are not refreshed. Visually resets the cooldown of Tranquil Boots, but does not skip the broken state.
Only refreshes items owned by the owner. Allied items in the inventory are not refreshed.
Visually resets the cooldown of Tranquil Boots, but does not skip the broken state.
This ability is not refreshed by Good Juju.
abilities.description: Reset the cooldowns on all items (except Refresher Orb).

name: Ex Machina
description: The remains of an ancient universe, preserved within a single sphere.
